data: “The old owl! I will give him somewhat to remember me by till some one else can say 'Gone' over him!”
"The old owl!  I will give him somewhat to remember me by till some one else can say 'Gone' over him!"
Margery (Gred): A Tale Of Old Nuremberg — Volume 07
